newsitem.title: UK: First Leisure first half profits slip.
newsitem.headline: First Leisure first half profits slip.

text.p: NOTE - Analysts had forecast pre-tax profits in a range between 16.7 and 17.2 million stg. Earnings per share were before asset disposals. Profit before asset disposals was 16.6 million stg compared to 16.5 million stg last time.
Full company name - First Leisure Corp Plc
